Typealiases.html#/s:16EightySixPercent20.name: EPMessageSendClosure
Typealiases.html#/s:16EightySixPercent20.abstract: A typealias for a custom controller send closure (called when the custom controller is closed).

Typealiases.html#/s:16EightySixPercent19.name: EPSendOptionClosure
Typealiases.html#/s:16EightySixPercent19.abstract: Block type for block called on message sending.

Protocols/EPManagerDelegate.html#/s:16Ei.name: epManagerFetchExternalInputOptions(contextKey:botUuid:completion:)
Protocols/EPManagerDelegate.html#/s:16Ei.abstract: Called when a chat input needs options that have to be fetched externally.

Protocols/EPManagerDelegate.html#/s:16Ei.name: epManagerChatConversationDidUpdate(chatConversationId:)
Protocols/EPManagerDelegate.html#/s:16Ei.abstract: Called when a chat conversation has been updated.

Protocols/EPManagerDelegate.html#/s:16Ei.name: epManagerChatConversationContextDidUpdate(chatConversationId:inserts:updates:botContext:)
Protocols/EPManagerDelegate.html#/s:16Ei.abstract: Called when a chat conversation context has been updated.

Protocols/EPManagerDelegate.html#/s:16Ei.name: epManagerAsyncTaskCalled(asyncTaskId:completion:)
Protocols/EPManagerDelegate.html#/s:16Ei.abstract: Called when a bot needs an asynchronous task to be executed.

Protocols/EPChatMessageViewControllerDel.name: epChatMessageViewControllerCustomInitialization(controller:)
Protocols/EPChatMessageViewControllerDel.abstract: Called when the controller setup is done to allow custom initializations.

Protocols/EPChatMessageViewControllerDel.name: epChatMessageViewControllerMessageDidUpdate(controller:lastMessage:chatConversation:)
Protocols/EPChatMessageViewControllerDel.abstract: Called when the last chat conversation message has been created/updated.

Protocols/EPChatMessageViewControllerDel.name: epChatMessageViewControllerChatConversationContextDidChange(controller:context:insertions:updates:)
Protocols/EPChatMessageViewControllerDel.abstract: Called when the chat conversation context has been updated.

Protocols/EPChatMessageViewControllerDel.name: epChatMessageViewControllerCustomInputType(controller:customInputTypeId:)
Protocols/EPChatMessageViewControllerDel.abstract: Called when a custom input type is required by the bot.

Protocols/EPChatMessageViewControllerDel.name: epChatMessageViewControllerBotDidFinish(controller:context:)
Protocols/EPChatMessageViewControllerDel.abstract: Called when the bot is finished. If the bot ends with a button, it is called when the user touches the button.

Protocols/EPChatMessageViewControllerDel.name: epChatMessageViewControllerUserDidInput(controller:content:context:)
Protocols/EPChatMessageViewControllerDel.abstract: Called when a user just answered an input.

Protocols/EPInputType.html#/s:16EightySi.name: sendClosure
Protocols/EPInputType.html#/s:16EightySi.abstract: Block called when the input is completed.

Protocols/EPInputType.html.name: EPInputType
Protocols/EPInputType.html.abstract: Protocol to implement on objects representing an input behaviour configuration.

Protocols/EPChatMessageViewControllerDel.name: EPChatMessageViewControllerDelegate
Protocols/EPChatMessageViewControllerDel.abstract: The EPChatMessageViewController delegate protocol composed of methods allowing to catch specific EPChatMessageViewController events.

Protocols/EPManagerDelegate.html.name: EPManagerDelegate
Protocols/EPManagerDelegate.html.abstract: The EPManager delegate protocol composed of methods allowing to catch specific EPManager events.

Extensions/Array.html#/s:Sa16EightySixPe.name: init(json:)
Extensions/Array.html#/s:Sa16EightySixPe.abstract: Initializes an array of EPContextObject from a JSON dictionary.

Extensions/Array.html#/s:Sa16EightySixPe.name: toJSON()
Extensions/Array.html#/s:Sa16EightySixPe.abstract: Converts an array of EPContextObject into a JSON dictionary.

Enums/EPBotFetchingStrategy.html#/s:16Ei.name: online(majorVersion:)
Enums/EPBotFetchingStrategy.html#/s:16Ei.abstract: Downloads the latest available version of the bot from the Bot Editor.

Enums/EPBotFetchingStrategy.html#/s:16Ei.name: offline(fileName:)
Enums/EPBotFetchingStrategy.html#/s:16Ei.abstract: Load the bot from a json file embedded into the app bundle.

Enums/EPBotFetchingStrategy.html#/s:16Ei.name: onlineWithDefault(majorVersion:fileName:)
Enums/EPBotFetchingStrategy.html#/s:16Ei.abstract: Downloads the latest available version of the bot from the Bot Editor. In case of error, it will load the bot from a json file embedded into the app bundle.

Enums.html#/s:16EightySixPercent16EPMess.name: EPMessageContent
Enums.html#/s:16EightySixPercent16EPMess.abstract: An enum representing the message content type.

Enums/EPBotFetchingStrategy.html.name: EPBotFetchingStrategy
Enums/EPBotFetchingStrategy.html.abstract: Determines the method that will be used to fetch a bot.

Enums.html#/s:16EightySixPercent35EPWork.name: EPWorkflowManagerDataSourceResponse
Enums.html#/s:16EightySixPercent35EPWork.abstract: Represents a response for the input options external fetching.

Enums.html#/s:16EightySixPercent34EPWork.name: EPWorkflowManagerAsyncTaskResponse
Enums.html#/s:16EightySixPercent34EPWork.abstract: Represents a response for the asynchronous task running.

Enums.html#/s:16EightySixPercent26EPInpu.name: EPInputOptionItemValueType
Enums.html#/s:16EightySixPercent26EPInpu.abstract: Represents the value type of an input option externally fetched.

Classes/EPContextObject.html#/s:16Eighty.name: value
Classes/EPContextObject.html#/s:16Eighty.abstract: The value associated with the context key. This is the raw value.

Classes/EPContextObject.html#/s:16Eighty.name: base64
Classes/EPContextObject.html#/s:16Eighty.abstract: A data base 64 string if this context object represents a file.

Classes/EPContextObject.html#/s:16Eighty.name: formattedValue
Classes/EPContextObject.html#/s:16Eighty.abstract: The formatted value to display in a message instead of the value itself.

Classes/EPContextObject.html#/s:16Eighty.name: toJSON()
Classes/EPContextObject.html#/s:16Eighty.abstract: Returns a JSON version of the EPContextObject.

Classes/EPContextObject.html#/c:@M@Eight.name: hashValue
Classes/EPContextObject.html#/c:@M@Eight.abstract: This hashValue is a combination between: key, value, base64 and formatted value. Then, isEqual will return true for context objects representing exactly the same thing.

Classes/EPChatConversation.html#/s:16Eig.name: updatedAt
Classes/EPChatConversation.html#/s:16Eig.abstract: The last date at which the chat conversation was modified.

Classes/EPChatConversation.html#/s:16Eig.name: avatarUrl
Classes/EPChatConversation.html#/s:16Eig.abstract: The url of the current bot avatar image.

Classes/EPChatConversation.html#/s:16Eig.name: botUuid
Classes/EPChatConversation.html#/s:16Eig.abstract: The uuid of the currently played bot.

Classes/EPChatConversation.html#/s:16Eig.name: languageCode
Classes/EPChatConversation.html#/s:16Eig.abstract: The current chat conversation language code. It is used to determine the language used by the bot.

Classes/EPChatConversation.html#/s:16Eig.name: botContextValue
Classes/EPChatConversation.html#/s:16Eig.abstract: Get the bot context as a dictonary.

Classes/EPChatConversation.html#/s:16Eig.name: botContextObjects
Classes/EPChatConversation.html#/s:16Eig.abstract: Get the bot context as an array of EPContextObject objects.

Classes/EPChatConversation.html#/s:16Eig.name: conversationDescription
Classes/EPChatConversation.html#/s:16Eig.abstract: Represents the name of the currently running bot. If the bot doesn’t exist, a default name is returned.

Classes/EPChatConversation.html#/s:16Eig.name: createFrom(exportedData:)
Classes/EPChatConversation.html#/s:16Eig.abstract: Creates a chat conversation object based on the provided data content.

Classes/EPChatConversation.html#/s:16Eig.name: init(botUuid:chatConversationId:initialContext:)
Classes/EPChatConversation.html#/s:16Eig.abstract: Intializes a new chat conversation for the given bot UUID.

Classes/EPChatConversation.html#/s:16Eig.name: export()
Classes/EPChatConversation.html#/s:16Eig.abstract: Export the chat conversation to a json data object.

Classes/EPManager.html#/s:16EightySixPer.name: enableLogs
Classes/EPManager.html#/s:16EightySixPer.abstract: If set to true it enables EightySixPercent logging.

Classes/EPManager.html#/s:16EightySixPer.name: enableAnalitycs
Classes/EPManager.html#/s:16EightySixPer.abstract: If set to true it enables analytics sending to the Bot Editor.

Classes/EPManager.html#/s:16EightySixPer.name: clearData()
Classes/EPManager.html#/s:16EightySixPer.abstract: Clears all chat conversations and associated data.

Classes/EPManager.html#/s:16EightySixPer.name: registerBot(uuid:fetchingStrategy:)
Classes/EPManager.html#/s:16EightySixPer.abstract: Registers a new bot to the EPManager.

Classes/EPManager.html#/s:16EightySixPer.name: controller(for:appearance:delegate:completion:)
Classes/EPManager.html#/s:16EightySixPer.abstract: Creates a view controller for the given chat conversation and appearance.

Classes/EPManager.html#/s:16EightySixPer.name: getChatConversation(forId:)
Classes/EPManager.html#/s:16EightySixPer.abstract: Get an existing chat conversation for a given id.

Classes/EPManager.html#/s:16EightySixPer.name: runBotOnChatConversation(chatConversation:botUuid:contextUpdate:replaceContext:completion:)
Classes/EPManager.html#/s:16EightySixPer.abstract: Runs a bot on the given chat conversation.

Classes/EPChatMessageViewController.html.name: conversation
Classes/EPChatMessageViewController.html.abstract: The chat conversation currently used in this controller.

Classes/EPCustomInputType.html#/s:16Eigh.name: sendClosure
Classes/EPCustomInputType.html#/s:16Eigh.abstract: Block called when the input is completed.

Classes/EPCustomInputType.html#/s:16Eigh.name: associatedController()
Classes/EPCustomInputType.html#/s:16Eigh.abstract: Get the custom controller associated to this input type.

Classes/EPBubbleAppearanceOption.html#/s.name: strongTextColor
Classes/EPBubbleAppearanceOption.html#/s.abstract: The message text color for a strong message.

Classes/EPBubbleAppearanceOption.html#/s.name: avatarPictureRounded
Classes/EPBubbleAppearanceOption.html#/s.abstract: If set to true the avatar picture will be rounded.

Classes/EPBubbleAppearanceOption.html#/s.name: bubbleImage
Classes/EPBubbleAppearanceOption.html#/s.abstract: The bubble background image. Will be tinted by the backgroundColor.

Classes/EPBubbleAppearanceOption.html#/s.name: bubbleOverImage
Classes/EPBubbleAppearanceOption.html#/s.abstract: An image to display over the bubble (for videos/images).

Classes/EPBubbleCellLayoutOption.html#/s.name: bubbleImageBorderInset
Classes/EPBubbleCellLayoutOption.html#/s.abstract: The insets of the bubble image inside its cell.

Classes/EPBubbleCellLayoutOption.html#/s.name: textContentBorderInset
Classes/EPBubbleCellLayoutOption.html#/s.abstract: The insets of the text inside the bubble image.

Classes/EPBubbleCellLayoutOption.html#/s.name: minRemainingSpace
Classes/EPBubbleCellLayoutOption.html#/s.abstract: The min width to keep between the bubble and the other side of the screen.

Classes/EPAppearance.html#/s:16EightySix.name: bubbleAppearance
Classes/EPAppearance.html#/s:16EightySix.abstract: The appearance of the different messages bubbles (incoming message, outgoing message, with or without a tail).

Classes/EPAppearance.html#/s:16EightySix.name: inputAppearance
Classes/EPAppearance.html#/s:16EightySix.abstract: The appearance of the input UI components.

Classes/EPAppearance.html#/s:16EightySix.name: customFontName
Classes/EPAppearance.html#/s:16EightySix.abstract: Font to use to display the messages. Default value is nil. (optional)

Classes/EPAppearance.html#/s:16EightySix.name: customStrongFontName
Classes/EPAppearance.html#/s:16EightySix.abstract: Font to use for strong messages. Default value is nil. (optional)

Classes/EPAppearance.html#/s:16EightySix.name: customBackgroundImage
Classes/EPAppearance.html#/s:16EightySix.abstract: Chat conversation background image. Default value is nil. (optional)

Classes/EPAppearance.html#/s:16EightySix.name: customBackgroundColor
Classes/EPAppearance.html#/s:16EightySix.abstract: Chat conversation background color. Default value is UIColor.clear.

Classes/EPAppearance.html#/s:16EightySix.name: customSectionDateColor
Classes/EPAppearance.html#/s:16EightySix.abstract: The font color of the date section title.

Classes/EPAppearance.html#/s:16EightySix.name: endBotButtonColor
Classes/EPAppearance.html#/s:16EightySix.abstract: When displaying a button at the bot end, this is its background color.

Classes/EPAppearance.html#/s:16EightySix.name: endBotButtonTextColor
Classes/EPAppearance.html#/s:16EightySix.abstract: When displaying a button at the bot end, this is its text color.

Classes/EPAppearance.html#/s:16EightySix.name: animationDuration
Classes/EPAppearance.html#/s:16EightySix.abstract: The duration of the input display animation.

Classes/EPAppearance.html#/s:16EightySix.name: animationSpringDamping
Classes/EPAppearance.html#/s:16EightySix.abstract: The spring damping for setting the drawer position.

Classes/EPAppearance.html#/s:16EightySix.name: animationSpringInitialVelocity
Classes/EPAppearance.html#/s:16EightySix.abstract: The spring initial velocity for setting the drawer position.

Classes/EPAppearance.html#/s:16EightySix.name: regularFont(size:)
Classes/EPAppearance.html#/s:16EightySix.abstract: Get the regular font based on the appearance with the specified size.

Classes/EPAppearance.html#/s:16EightySix.name: strongFont(size:)
Classes/EPAppearance.html#/s:16EightySix.abstract: Get the strong font based on the appearance with the specified size.

Classes/EPInputChatAppearanceOption.html.name: inputTextContainer
Classes/EPInputChatAppearanceOption.html.abstract: The image to use as the input textfield background.

Classes/EPBubbleChatAppearanceOption.htm.name: incomingBubbleAppearance
Classes/EPBubbleChatAppearanceOption.htm.abstract: The appearance to use for an incoming message bubble (with the tail).

Classes/EPBubbleChatAppearanceOption.htm.name: incomingBubbleAppearanceFollowed
Classes/EPBubbleChatAppearanceOption.htm.abstract: The appearance to use for an incoming message bubble followed by another incoming message bubble (without the tail).

Classes/EPBubbleChatAppearanceOption.htm.name: outgoingBubbleAppearance
Classes/EPBubbleChatAppearanceOption.htm.abstract: The appearance to use for an outgoing message bubble (with the tail).

Classes/EPBubbleChatAppearanceOption.htm.name: outgoingBubbleAppearanceFollowed
Classes/EPBubbleChatAppearanceOption.htm.abstract: The appearance to use for an outgoing message bubble followed by another outgoing message bubble (without the tail).

Classes/EPBubbleChatAppearanceOption.htm.name: typingAnimation
Classes/EPBubbleChatAppearanceOption.htm.abstract: The typing animation to use when the bot is writing a message.

Classes/EPBubbleLayoutContext.html#/s:16.name: isMessageIncoming
Classes/EPBubbleLayoutContext.html#/s:16.abstract: If true, the message is incoming (sent by the bot to the user).

Classes/EPBubbleLayoutContext.html#/s:16.name: isFollowedByTheSameBubble
Classes/EPBubbleLayoutContext.html#/s:16.abstract: If true it means that an incoming bubble is followed by another incoming bubble or, an outgoing bubble is followed by another outgoing bubble.

Classes/EPBubbleChatAppearanceOption.htm.name: EPBubbleChatAppearanceOption
Classes/EPBubbleChatAppearanceOption.htm.abstract: Object representing the appearance of the different messages bubbles.

Classes/EPInputChatAppearanceOption.html.name: EPInputChatAppearanceOption
Classes/EPInputChatAppearanceOption.html.abstract: Object representing the appearance of the input UI components.

Classes/EPAppearance.html.name: EPAppearance
Classes/EPAppearance.html.abstract: Object representing the appearance of a chat conversation.

Classes/EPCustomInputType.html.name: EPCustomInputType
Classes/EPCustomInputType.html.abstract: Represents an input type for the custom controller input.

Classes/EPChatMessageViewController.html.name: EPChatMessageViewController
Classes/EPChatMessageViewController.html.abstract: The controller used to display the conversations and to interact with them.

Classes/EPManager.html.name: EPManager
Classes/EPManager.html.abstract: This manager is the 86% SDK entry point.

Classes/EPChatConversation.html.name: EPChatConversation
Classes/EPChatConversation.html.abstract: This object represents a chat conversation in which a bot will run.

Classes/EPContextObject.html.name: EPContextObject
Classes/EPContextObject.html.abstract: An EPContextObject represents a valu stored into a chat conversation context.

Typealiases.html.name: Type Aliases
Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
